title: Faculty Needs Help Setting Up LMS Gradebook
description: A faculty member needs assistance setting up the weighted categories for their course gradebook in the LMS.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and the course.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the faculty member's identity and course shell.

tasks.description: Access the LMS as a support user to view the course.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gains view-only access to the course's LMS page.

tasks.description: Walk the faculty member through the steps to create weighted grade categories (e.g., Assignments 40%, Midterm 30%, Final 30%).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step guidance, resulting in a correctly configured gradebook.
